name: Maggie's Grinning Soul
description:
Controls
Use the mouse or the pad to click on the items and the questions.
Press Esc ingame to access the tutorial.

Synopsis
In Maggie's Grinning Soul, you play Yolanda, a psychic investigator hired by the police to help solve the case of the unexplained death of a teenage girl named Margaret. Lead your investigation by inspecting items in Margaret room's and get in contact with her spirit through a Ouija board.

Maggie Grinning's Soul was created by 8 students from CNAM-ENJMIN and Paris 3 Sorbonne Nouvelle.

We hope you'll enjoy our game!
